channel.title: Meta on Joshua M. Rosenberg
channel.description: Recent content in Meta on Joshua M. Rosenberg

item.title: Wordpress Archive
item.description: I moved my Wordpress blog to Wordpress.com as an archive and so I would not need to pay to maintain the self-hosted site. The link is here.

item.title: From Wordpress to GitHub Pages
item.description: I have used Wordpress for more than seven years. Over that time, Iâ€™ve used multiple shared servers, and have had a myriad of domain names. Most recently, my shared server at Lansing, MI-based Liquid Web ended, due to Liquid Web leaving the shared hosting business to focus only on dedicated and virtual private servers. I started to look for a new hosting company, and slowly started to coalesce around the idea of, well, not having one, and using GitHub Pages instead.
